description.short: I wrote this article on how important a well designed logging framework is.
I'm always trying to make my frontend components the most reusable possible and give it to community if it answers a concern that can be faced by anyone else.
I joined a friend of mine on this open-source project which aims to reduce the amount of time spent on generic documents filling by interpolating data within placehoders.
I founded a student organization and headed it during one year. The main goal was to help students to succeed in their studies and to offer them some events when they can meet older/younger students.
